name: ClaimSubmit
title: Submit a PAS request
description: This operation is used to submit a prior authorization request to a payer. The request is submitted as a Bundle containing a Claim resource and supporting documentation.
comment: This operation submits a prior authorization request Bundle to a payer for review. The Bundle must contain a Claim resource conforming to the PAS profile and may include supporting resources such as QuestionnaireResponse for DTR data.

parameter.name: resource
parameter.documentation: A Bundle resource containing the prior authorization request with Claim as the primary resource and supporting documentation

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A Bundle resource containing the ClaimResponse and any supporting resources, or a Task resource if processing asynchronously
